name: Center for Intersectional Justice (CIJ)
goal: CIJ is a non-profit organisation founded in 2017 and based in Berlin. We engage in advocacy and policy-oriented research to make anti-discrimination and equality policy more inclusive and address structural inequalities more effectively in Europe.
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
